step up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to increase the amount of an activity or the speed of a process in order to improve a situation
step up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The health department is stepping up efforts to reduce teenage smoking.
step up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to agree to help someone or to be responsible for doing something
step up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Residents will have to step up if they want to rid this area of crime.
step up.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to increase the amount of an activity or the speed of a process in order to improve a situation
step up.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: We will be stepping up production to meet increased demand.
